english_example_sentence: If he had remained calm during the accident, he could have helped others
russian_example_sentence: Если бы он остался спокойным во время аварии, он мог бы помочь другим
turkish_example_sentence: O kaza sırasında sakin kalmışsa, yaralı insanlara yardım edebilirdi
